content.raw:
No, I do not get good lidar data. But I have not tried to fix it either. I think that Rud and others have made some progress on this and I was planning on following his methods to see if I could get it to work. Just have not had the chance to work much on this project yet other than getting the machine built.

I am also hoping to use lidar for my solution. Will use stereo if I have to.
content.html:
No, I do not get good lidar data. But I have not tried to fix it either. I think that Rud and others have made some progress on this and I was planning on following his methods to see if I could get it to work. Just have not had the chance to work much on this project yet other than getting the machine built.

I am also hoping to use lidar for my solution. Will use stereo if I have to.
